short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy page URL and title with different format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy both page URL and page title together.

Variations:
[Click]: Copy Link + Title
[Double Click]: Copy Link + Title + JIRA Assignee

If you copy to Rich Text Editor like MS Word, Google Docs, YouDao Note, it will keep the href of the URL

Customization:
[Jira]: It will process the jira link, remove the prefix '[ticket number]' and the suffix '- JIRA' from page title.
